data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 15, Coritiba are pushing forward but Robson's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Martin Sarrafiore (Coritiba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Coritiba.
Matheus Sales (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 25, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Free kick Coritiba.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 30, Vasco da Gama pushes forward through German Cano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Coritiba surge into the attack at Estadio Couto Pereira but Robsonâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 33, Coritiba are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 34, Ygor Catatau (Vasco da Gama) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Robson (Coritiba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In the minute 39, Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Martin Sarrafiore of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 39, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Sarrafiore for Coritiba has been booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Vasco da Gama drive upfield and Marcos Junior gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Curitiba.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Coritiba's area.
In the minute 44, Coritiba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vasco da Gama.
Ygor Catatau (Vasco da Gama) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Coritiba have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 45, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Coritiba throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Coritiba are whistled for offside.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jorginho is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Yan Sasse replacing Martin Sarrafiore.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Curitiba.
In the minute 50, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 52, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 55, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Coritiba's area.
Vasco da Gama drives forward and German Cano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 57, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 60, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Robson. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 61, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama drive into the zone and Talles Magno is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 62, Thiago Lopes is replacing Matheus Bueno for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yago Pikachu (Vasco da Gama) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Coritiba needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 66, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno misses with an attempt on goal.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Coritiba.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 70, Vasco da Gama's Ygor Catatau gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 72, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Fellipe Bastos replacing Bruno Gomes.
In the minute 74, Guilherme Parede is on a sub for Ygor Catatau for Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Ribamar replacing Bruno Cesar.
The home team have replaced Giovanni Augusto with Gabriel Santana. This is the third substitution made today by Jorginho.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Thiago Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Coritiba are coming forward and Hugo Moura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Guilherme Parede is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 84, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coritiba push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Yan Sasse gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vasco da Gama defence.
Coritiba have been given a penalty at Estadio Couto Pereira...
In the minute 86, Vasco da Gama's Yago Pikachu has been booked in Curitiba.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Coritiba's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Neto Borges of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Coritiba.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Robson.
The home team have replaced Hugo Moura with Ramon Martinez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorginho.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a fourth substitution, with Lucas Santos replacing Talles Magno.
